main event: A round, yellow-orange object the size of a half-dollar was observed moving on a straight course at Las Vegas, Nevada on January 27, 1957.
interesting points: The object was in sight for 25-30 seconds.
Another sighting of a bright white, circular object 40-45 feet in diameter was reported in Las Vegas, Nevada on October 16, 1957.
The object hovered and then moved off rapidly.
A police officer in Las Vegas reported seeing a yellow-orange light, approximately 30 feet in diameter, moving at a high rate of speed on November 6, 1957.
A taxi driver near Las Vegas reported seeing a spherical, brilliant white object about 35 feet in diameter hovering at 500 feet, which then accelerated at high speed on November 26, 1957.
sighted object: round yellow-orange object, bright white circular object, yellow-orange light, spherical brilliant white object
